languages.text: "Первая карта — "Юный воин". Она означает неопытность, путь становления. Карта вторая — "Расколотый мир". Перевернута. Извилистым и тернистым будет тот путь, но на нем соберешь ты соратников и отыщешь то, что утрачено".
languages.translation_comment:
НА КОМОРРУ
The Young Warrior / The Shattered World / The Hound / The Lost Child

НА КОМОРРУ
The Young Warrior / The Shattered World / The Hound / The Lost Child

languages.text: "The first card is the Young Warrior. It suggests inexperience, a path of becoming. The second card is the Shattered World, inverted. The path will have twists, turns, and thorns, but you will gather allies along the way and find what was lost."
languages.original_text: "Первая карта — "Юный воин". Она означает неопытность, путь становления. Карта вторая — "Расколотый мир". Перевернута. Извилистым и тернистым будет тот путь, но на нем соберешь ты соратников и отыщешь то, что утрачено".

traits.locale_text: "The first card. The Young Warrior. It spells inexperience, a path of becoming. The second card. The Shattered World. Inverted. The path will have twists, turns, and thorns, but you will gather allies along the way and find what was lost."

"The first card. The Young Warrior. It spells inexperience, a path of becoming. The second card. The Shattered World. Inverted. The path will have twists, turns, and thorns, but you will gather allies along the way and find what was lost."

languages.text: «La primera carta es el Guerrero bisoño. Sugiere inexperiencia, un camino para el desarrollo. La segunda carta es el Mundo devastado, pero está invertido. Este camino se presentará sinuoso y lleno de obstáculos, pero contará con aliados para recorrerlo y al final encontrará lo que estaba perdido».
languages.original_text: "The first card is the Young Warrior. It suggests inexperience, a path of becoming. The second card is the Shattered World, inverted. The path will have twists, turns, and thorns, but you will gather allies along the way and find what was lost."

traits.locale_text: «La primera carta es el Guerrero bisoño. Sugiere inexperiencia, un camino para el desarrollo. La segunda carta es el Mundo devastado, pero está invertido. Este camino se presentará sinuoso y lleno de obstáculos, pero contará con aliados para recorrerlo y al final encontrará lo que estaba perdido».

languages.text: 「最初のカードは『若き戦士』。このカードは未熟さ、成熟への道を暗示している。2枚目のカードは『荒廃した世界』の逆位置。道は紆余曲折し、いばらの道となるだろうけれど、失われたものを見つける途中で見方を集めることになる」
languages.original_text: "The first card is the Young Warrior. It suggests inexperience, a path of becoming. The second card is the Shattered World, inverted. The path will have twists, turns, and thorns, but you will gather allies along the way and find what was lost."

traits.locale_text: 「最初のカードは『若き戦士』。このカードは未熟さ、成熟への道を暗示している。2枚目のカードは『荒廃した世界』の逆位置。道は紆余曲折し、いばらの道となるだろうけれど、失われたものを見つける途中で見方を集めることになる」

languages.text: “第一张牌是正位年轻勇士，它暗示缺乏经验，代表着成长的道路。第二张牌是逆位破碎世界，这条道路会充满曲折与荆棘，但你会在旅途中召集盟友，找到失落之物。”
languages.original_text: "The first card is the Young Warrior. It suggests inexperience, a path of becoming. The second card is the Shattered World, inverted. The path will have twists, turns, and thorns, but you will gather allies along the way and find what was lost."

traits.locale_text: “第一张牌是正位年轻勇士，它暗示缺乏经验，代表着成长的道路。第二张牌是逆位破碎世界，这条道路会充满曲折与荆棘，但你会在旅途中召集盟友，找到失落之物。”

languages.text: "Die erste Karte ist der Junge Krieger. Sie steht für Unerfahrenheit und den Weg der Veränderung. Die zweite Karte ist die Zertrümmerte Welt, umgedreht. Der Weg wird gewunden und voller Dornen sein, aber Ihr werdet unterwegs Verbündete sammeln und finden, was verloren war."
languages.original_text: "The first card is the Young Warrior. It suggests inexperience, a path of becoming. The second card is the Shattered World, inverted. The path will have twists, turns, and thorns, but you will gather allies along the way and find what was lost."

traits.locale_text: "Die erste Karte ist der Junge Krieger. Sie steht für Unerfahrenheit und den Weg der Veränderung. Die zweite Karte ist die Zertrümmerte Welt, umgedreht. Der Weg wird gewunden und voller Dornen sein, aber Ihr werdet unterwegs Verbündete sammeln und finden, was verloren war."

languages.text: « La première carte est celle du Jeune guerrier. Elle est synonyme d'inexpérience et de parcours initiatique. La deuxième est le Monde brisé, à l'envers. La route sera pavée de tours, détours et autres embûches, mais vous rassemblerez des alliés en chemin et vous retrouverez ce qui a été perdu. »
languages.original_text: "The first card is the Young Warrior. It suggests inexperience, a path of becoming. The second card is the Shattered World, inverted. The path will have twists, turns, and thorns, but you will gather allies along the way and find what was lost."

traits.locale_text: « La première carte est celle du Jeune guerrier. Elle est synonyme d'inexpérience et de parcours initiatique. La deuxième est le Monde brisé, à l'envers. La route sera pavée de tours, détours et autres embûches, mais vous rassemblerez des alliés en chemin et vous retrouverez ce qui a été perdu. »

languages.original_text: "The first card is the Young Warrior. It suggests inexperience, a path of becoming. The second card is the Shattered World, inverted. The path will have twists, turns, and thorns, but you will gather allies along the way and find what was lost."

languages.text: "İlk kart Genç Savaşçı. Tecrübesizlik ve büyümeye çıkan yolu temsil eder. İkinci kart Çatlak Dünya, ters. Yolda çarpıklıklar, dönemeçler ve dikenler olacak ama yolda müttefik elde edip yitirdiklerini bulacaksın."
languages.original_text: "The first card is the Young Warrior. It suggests inexperience, a path of becoming. The second card is the Shattered World, inverted. The path will have twists, turns, and thorns, but you will gather allies along the way and find what was lost."
